title: DalVacationHome üè†
details: Architected and deployed a multi-cloud booking app on AWS and Google Cloud, ensuring scalability and 99.9% uptime.
Designed an Amazon Lex Chatbot and AWS Lambda-based booking logic for user interaction and support.

Implemented booking and authentication notifications with AWS SNS and SQS, ensuring real-time updates and security.

details: Created a CI/CD pipeline with Docker and GitLab runners, reducing build and deployment times by 60% through caching.

title: InstituteManagementPortal üè´
details: Completed project under the TCS-Microsoft SIRIUS initiative, focused on MS Azure and Power Platform training.
